channel.title: BudHole - Sports, Video Games, Conspiracies
channel.description: It's where the buds hangout. We talk Sports, Video Games, Conspiracies, and other cool stuff. Check us out on instagram and twitter @officialbudhole!
channel.author: OfficialBudHole
channel.itunes:author: OfficialBudHole
channel.itunes:summary: It's where the buds hangout. We talk Sports, Video Games, Conspiracies, and other cool stuff. Check us out on instagram and twitter @officialbudhole!

item.title: Budhole Bit - Quarantine Cast 2.0
item.description: In this episode the buds talk about how the quarantine is still impacting them and what they’re doing to entertain themselves while this shelter in place is going on.  As well as talk over #Playstations new March Madness sales going on and the top 5 Will Ferrell movies of all time in our minds including our most underrated Will Ferrell movie of all time.
item.dc:creator: OfficialBudHole
item.itunes:summary: In this episode the buds talk about how the quarantine is still impacting them and what they’re doing to entertain themselves while this shelter in place is going on.  As well as talk over #Playstations new March Madness sales going on and the top 5 Will Ferrell movies of all time in our minds including our most underrated Will Ferrell movie of all time.

item.title: Budhole #30
item.description: The buds break down the new #twitter bracket coming up, Running Backs in the NFL. As well as what the NFC North and AFC North will be targeting in Round 1 of the NFL draft! Then some #Twitter questions!
item.dc:creator: OfficialBudHole
item.itunes:summary: The buds break down the new #twitter bracket coming up, Running Backs in the NFL. As well as what the NFC North and AFC North will be targeting in Round 1 of the NFL draft! Then some #Twitter questions!

item.title: Budhole #29
item.description:
** New Major Announcement! Welcome to the Corn Brew Podcast! Check them out wherever and whenever you get your podcasts! **


#Budhole Twitter Battle Royale announcement and seeding! Grades are given for every single NFL team thru Free Agency as of Monday 3/25/2020!!


Check us out on all social media platforms @officialbudhole!

Check out our website as well for all of our content - https://officialbudhole.wixsite.com/website

item.title: Budhole Bit - Dog Hunting In Quarantine!
item.description: This Bit takes place as all of the buds are in isolation and Star Lamar is out.  In this bit the buds break down how Quarantine life is going while Brandon drives around hunting for his dog! Gage goes over Frisbee golf techniques as well! Follow our social media accounts - @officialbudhole
